Package org.apache.trevni.avro

package org.apache.trevni.avro
Read and write Avro data in Trevni column files.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.apache.trevni
    A column file format.
    org.apache.trevni.avro.mapreduce
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AvroColumnReader<D>
    Read files written with AvroColumnWriter.
    AvroColumnReader.Params
    Parameters for reading an Avro column file.
    AvroColumnWriter<D>
    Write Avro records to a Trevni column file.
    AvroTrevniInputFormat<T>
    An InputFormat for Trevni files.
    AvroTrevniOutputFormat<T>
